definition: to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)

sentences.english: Neoprene tube cover, plug-n-play reservoir attachment, bite valve with cover.
sentences.chinese: 氯丁橡胶管套，即插即用存储附件，咬阀盖。

sentences.english: Tubes and covers made of polyester, polyamide and other polymers for mechanical protection and sound reduction.
sentences.chinese: 能够起到机械保护和减低噪音效果的软管和管套。

sentences.english: A mild pre-heating of the whole socket area is recommended.
sentences.chinese: 建议对整个管套区域进行适当的预热。

sentences.english: If you've been wondering about those black stripes on the casings, all is about to be revealed.
sentences.chinese: 如果你一直对管套上的黑条感到疑惑，一切即将揭晓。

definition: to spread litter in a cowshed, pigsty etc
nut (female component of nut and bolt)
heat shrink tubing (aka heatshrink) (shrinkable plastic tube used to insulate wires)
bolt (male component of nut and bolt)/screw
